name: Bullet Renegade
description:
Bullet Renegade is an immersive first person shooter set in wild west. Shoot hundreds of mutants with your amazing weapons.

4 man project made in 2 months for school.

Programming and music: Santtu-Elmeri Nieminen

3D Assets: Sami Kuopusjärvi, Jimi Vihavainen

Level Design: Atte Härkönen

Made with unity.
